itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer, and cricketer (1882-1956)

wikipedia_page.main: Evan William Watkins (third ¼ 1882 – 9 January 1956) was a Welsh rugby union, and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1900s, and cricketer who played in the 1900s and 1910s. He played representative level  rugby union (RU) for Monmouthshire, and at club level for Abertillery, and club level rugby league (RL) for Warrington (Heritage № 146), as a wing. He also played cricket for Monmouthshire.
